channel.description: Recent content in Additional User Documentation on Documentation

item.title: Users: Provider Specific Documentation
item.description:
Some service providers in the EGI Federation publish documentation about how to work with their sites. Below is a list:

  • CESNET-MCC
  • IFCA-LCG2
  • IN2P3-IRES

This information is handy to deal with the particularities of the services deployed by a given provider. It usually covers OpenStack deployments, but may also document other services.

item.title: Users: Community Specific Documentation
item.description: In the following sections you can find documentation for communities that are using EGI services. These will typically cover an introduction of the scientific or research community, the procedure to gain access to the resources of the community, and guidelines about how to participate in the community.
